title: XDM Decision Action
description: An Action is something that is done as a result of an event and the satisfaction of zero or more decision criteria, or formulas.

xdm:id.title: Action identifier
xdm:id.description: Action's unique identifier that can be resolved to a service endpoint to invoke the action. The identifier can be used as part of a path in an HTTP request.  It must only contain letters, digits, underscores, and dashes and must start with a letter.  If no xdm:name parameter is specified this ide will be used as the displayed as the name.

xdm:name.title: Action name
xdm:name.description: Action's external human-readable name to clients. Property has the semantic of schema.org's 'name' property defined on http://schema.org/Thing

xdm:description.title: Action description
xdm:description.description: An optional human readable string that describes what this action does.

xdm:version.title: Action version
xdm:version.description: The version of the action.  The major version must be changed if the arguments or output of the action is changed.

xdm:language.title: Action implementation language
xdm:language.description: A string or enum representing the programming language the action is written in.  Currently this must be set to 'JSON'.
